verbose_text: Other bioactivities of PIT1 have also been reported, like regulating anterior pituitary development [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and pituitary cell proliferation [XREF_BIBR], silencing or delaying adrenarche in human [XREF_BIBR], being related to dwarf phenotype in mice [XREF_BIBR], as well as inducing the differentiation of hepatic progenitor cells into PRL producing cells [XREF_BIBR].
